product_name: DIBS BeautyDesert Island Duo Blush + Bronzer Stick
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's Desert Island Duo is your all-in-one stick. The custom paired bronzer and blush will instantly transform your face in the flick of a wrist.
details: DetailsFeaturesPerfectly paired bronzer + blush in one easy duoCreamy, buildable, blendable, streak-free applicationLayer and stack for endless possibilitiesFor usage on the face + lipsSafe for sensitive skinAllergy- and dermatologist-testedKey IngredientsMango Seed Butter: Softens and moisturizes dry skinJojoba Oil: Rich in vitamin E, it softens and smoothsHyaluronic Acid: Known to reduce wrinkles and fine lines by boosting elasticity and moistureAntioxidant Blend: Sunflower seed, rosemary, and castor oil to enhance texture and brighten skin toneVanillin: Signature scent (and a natural pheromone too)Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenItem 2628519How To UseSwipe the bronzer on your forehead, nose, cheekbones, and jawline for warmth and dimension. Add blush to apples of cheeks and anywhere else you want a pop of color. Apply directly from the stick or tap Duo Brush Face to stick, blend with the Duo Brush Face or your fingertips. Start with your base primer or foundation, then layer the duo, and finish with a setting powder or baked blush/bronzer.IngredientsBlush: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecanol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Kaolin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Vanillin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).Bronzer: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Octyldodecanol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Synthetic Wax, Isostearyl Isostearate, Kaolin, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Vanillin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe the bronzer on your forehead, nose, cheekbones, and jawline for warmth and dimension. Add blush to apples of cheeks and anywhere else you want a pop of color. Apply directly from the stick or tap Duo Brush Face to stick, blend with the Duo Brush Face or your fingertips. Start with your base primer or foundation, then layer the duo, and finish with a setting powder or baked blush/bronzer.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great for travel

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments:
I walked in to Ulta the day after Dibs was shown on abc. 
The ladies were wonderful. These are great products and the price is right. I also bought a Murad eye cream and cleanser. Thak you

reviews.headline: Love this duo
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this duo. They blend effortlessly and look beautiful. Great for traveling, too.

reviews.headline: Love this easy and beautiful formula!
reviews.comments: Formula blends so easily and color is a nice summer flush, no orangey tones just a kisses by the sun warmth.

I've heard such great things about this product, it's creamy, blends well, and is double sided which is a win win. It didn't work for my skin, I do have combination/not sensitive skin but this did break me out. After looking at the ingredients, it makes sense considering there are multiple oils & butters in it, including: jojoba oil, macademia oil, shea butter, etc. If you tolerate products with those ingredients then I absolutely recommend it but if not, I'd give something else a try ðŸŒŸ

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Loved the product, shade 3 was too light, I'll be getting shade 4

reviews.headline: Wet
reviews.comments: The consistency is so wet and shiny. It doesnt dry down and its very shiny looking. Not dewy, wet. Im super disappointed becuase I love the concept and colors and I prefer products on the dewier side for consistency but this just makes me look sweaty.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I love this duo.  It is so convenient to have the bronzer and blush on the same stick.  I love that they have several choices for colors.  I am pale and the Desert Island Duo works perfectly.  I have tried other products and always come back to it.

reviews.headline: Was so pretty on the skin
reviews.comments: This product was so pretty, worked great on the skin and blended easily. I did end up returning it because I feel like it broke me out especially on my forehead and it gave my skin a lot of texture i didn't have before. I wouldn't recommend it if you have acne prone skin

reviews.headline: Probably Won't Repurchase
reviews.comments: I'm giving this 2 stars because of the lack of product not the product itself. The product itself is great, but for the price, and the size of the packagingâ€¦ I would expect there to be more product. I feel like it's a little bit of a rip off to pay so much for so little no matter how good it is. If you look at the size of the packaging, you would expect there to be a lot of bronzer and blush but the value just isn't there. Again, the product itself is fine, but there are a lot of products that are decent dupes for less money and more product.

reviews.headline: Double the product !
reviews.comments:
So easy to blend 
 Has 2 colors i. One application product 
Need to have  for shading

reviews.headline: Horrible packaging
reviews.comments: The product is good but for the price, the packaging should be better. This brand cut corners with packaging.. its cheap and  came apart on first use.  To expensive for what you get. Some brands take advantage and over charge.

reviews.headline: Great cream bronzer
reviews.comments: I love the bronzer end for under my powder bronzer - it makes your powder really appear smooth and not at all cakey - very natural look.  I am not crazy about the other end for the blush - a bit too red for my face but I am naturally red so could work well for others.  Consistency is great - I use a sponge.

reviews.headline: broke me out
reviews.comments: I don't have very sensitive skin but when i used this product i broke out, so obviously i stopped using it and my skin is better now. I don't recommend this product

reviews.headline: Love, but it breaks me out
reviews.comments: I love the product, the color options and it lasts well and is pigmented. The only thing I don't like is it breaks me out around my jawline anytime I wear it.

reviews.headline: NOT acne safe
reviews.comments: The ingredients in this product are extremely pore clogging. I have not had acne in roughly 3 years, but I began breaking out again in the exact places where I placed this product.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail Product
reviews.comments: I am in my mid twenties, i grew up by the beach, & was raised with minimal knowledge of makeup. My mom would leave the house with a swipe of blush and mascara if anything. That being said when i receieved dibs in my FFF box, I was excited to try a two in one product. I fell in love with the simplicity of it. I felt so pretty while still feeling natural. The formula itself isnt cakey, sticky, or heavy. Its completely lightweight & allows mistake. Blends into your skin and is buildable!! To this day if im not going to a fancier function, ill put on dibs & then some mascara and i feel like me! I've recommended this product to now dozens of people in my circle & shared on social media. I love dibs, you should try this asap!

reviews.headline: Nice butâ€¦
reviews.comments: This is a good product. The blush is a good color and blends out nicely. The bronzer is a bit warmer and more orange than I was expecting but it blends out well. However, this product is really expensive for what it is. You can find equally good dual ended sticks at a much better price point.

reviews.headline: Cheaply made
reviews.comments: I saw all the hype on tik tok so I ordered one and a bit disappointed in the quality of the product. It's very cheap plastic. And the bronzer side is very orange. However the blush it's a very pretty coral pink.

reviews.headline: Love it , I would definitely buy it again.
reviews.comments: Love it

media.headline: Love it for that settle pop!

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm all about the red shade. I don't use blush ever but this one convinced me, because it doubles as a lip color! It's so creamy and doesn't pill or get chalky. When I got this stick during the previews, I was skeptical until I saw on Instagram all the people using it in place of lipstick. I'm fairly light skin so the bronzer isn't for all over in the fall but I've been playing around with it as a contour and it WORKS too. Love that there are two sides of this because I would buy even if it was just a great lipstick replacement.
faceoff_positive.headline: In love with the red

faceoff_negative.comments: I've been so excited to try this since the day it came out. I finally pulled the trigger and apparently I'm alone in this but I hate it. Hates a strong word but truly applicable. Maybe because the brush and preferred color has been out of stock for so long is part of the problem. If that's the case, stop encouraging influencers to push people to buy colors that aren't ideal as well as a product that a specific brush works for if it's always sold out.   I'd love to say it's user error because that would mean this greasy stick has salvaging potential. This is coming from someone who was a makeup artist for over 15 years as well as watched a ton of "tutorials" for this duo stick. I bought an eyeliner and lipliner as wall and they're all equally trash. I so wanted all let alone any of these products to work cause o love my girl Courtney. These flops are leaving me with major trust issues now for anything Dibs or CS sponsored. So sad!
faceoff_negative.headline: So bummed

rollup.name: Desert Island Duo Blush + Bronzer Stick
